ğŸ“š Help

This bot helps you buy and sell real estate in Azerbaijan.

Available commands:
/start - Start over
/help - Show help
/cancel - Cancel current operation
/settings - Language settings
/my_requests - My requests (buyer)
/my_listings - My listings (seller)
